definition: tablet announcing the name of leading actor in a theatrical production/by extension, the lead role
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
The Tiger tablet, Yuan dynasty play by Li Zhifu 李直夫[Li3 Zhi2 fu1]

sentences.english: Ceng Nianan explanation, xiao LAN is the number one here in the future.
sentences.chinese: 曾念安解釋，以後蕭嵐就是這裏的頭牌。

sentences.english: The letter at Counter 6will pay you against your number slip.
sentences.chinese: 六號欄櫃的出納員將根據你的號頭牌給付你錢。

sentences.english: NO02, In most games, face cards have a value of ten.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數的遊戲中，人頭牌代表了十點。

sentences.english: I shared this dish with my lunch companions.
sentences.chinese: 我與我的午餐同伴一起分享了這個頭牌。

sentences.english: A card is put between two picture cards.
sentences.chinese: 一張牌是插在兩張人頭牌中。

sentences.english: His recent accomplishments have established him as Mexico's premiere fighter.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的這些成就已經使他成爲墨西哥的頭牌拳手。

definition: shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
loved by all/to have universal appeal
the first stick of incense placed in the censer (believed to bring good luck esp. during festivities)/(slang) (Tw) the first reply to a blog post etc
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
to buy soy sauce/it's none of my business ("I’m just here to buy some soy sauce")
title of respect for the queen mother or the emperor's father/nickname for Empress Dowager Cixi 慈禧太后[Ci2 xi3 tai4 hou4]
